common.noSpam: No spam. No pressure. Direct access to me.

services.title: Services That Drive Results
services.pageSubtitle: Comprehensive AI automation and web development services designed to help your business thrive in the digital age.
services.subtitle: From AI automation to custom web development, I deliver solutions that help your business save time, reduce costs, and scale efficiently.
services.readySubtitle: Let's discuss your project and find the best solution for your business needs.

aiAutomation.title: AI Automation
aiAutomation.description: Transform your business operations with intelligent automation that works 24/7. From workflow automation to custom AI agents, I build solutions that save you hours of manual work every week.
benefits: Save 10+ hours per week on repetitive tasks

webDev.title: Custom Web Development
webDev.description: Full-stack development for complex applications. I build robust, scalable web applications using modern technologies that grow with your business.

websiteDesign.title: Website Design & Development
websiteDesign.description: Modern, fast, and SEO-friendly websites that convert visitors into customers. From landing pages to full business websites, I create digital experiences that drive results.

aiIntegration.title: AI Integration
aiIntegration.description: Enhance your existing systems with cutting-edge AI capabilities. I integrate AI into your workflows, apps, and processes to unlock new possibilities.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: A simple, transparent process designed to deliver results quickly and efficiently.

step1.title: Discovery & Strategy
step1.description: We start with a free consultation to understand your business goals, challenges, and requirements. I'll analyze your needs and propose the best solution.

step2.title: Design & Automation Planning
step2.description: I create detailed wireframes, system designs, and automation workflows. You'll see exactly how your solution will work before development begins.

step3.title: Development & Integration
step3.description: Your solution is built with clean, scalable code. I integrate all necessary systems, APIs, and AI capabilities while keeping you updated on progress.

step4.title: Launch & Support
step4.description: After thorough testing, we launch your solution. I provide training, documentation, and ongoing support to ensure everything runs smoothly.

whyMe.title: Why Work With Me?
whyMe.subtitle: When you work with me, you get a dedicated partner who is invested in your success. I combine technical expertise with a deep understanding of business needs to deliver solutions that actually make a difference.

custom.title: Custom-Built Solutions
custom.description: No templates or cookie-cutter approaches. Every solution is designed and built specifically for your unique business needs and goals.

technical.title: Strong Technical Background
technical.description: Deep expertise in full-stack development, AI/ML technologies, and automation tools. I stay current with the latest technologies and best practices.

communication.title: Fast Communication
communication.description: Clear, regular updates throughout the project. You'll always know the status of your project and have direct access to me for questions.

results.title: Focus on Business Results
results.description: I don't just write code—I solve business problems. Every feature is designed to drive measurable outcomes and ROI for your company.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.subtitle: A selection of recent work showcasing AI automation, web development, and integration solutions.

cta.title: Let's Automate Your Business
cta.subtitle: Ready to save time, reduce costs, and scale with AI automation and custom web solutions? Let's discuss how I can help transform your business.

footer.tagline: AI Automation & Web Development that helps businesses save time, reduce costs, and scale efficiently.

profile.manifesto: You’ll work directly with me — no middlemen, no outsourcing. Clear communication, real delivery, real results.

about.title: AI Automation Engineer & Full-Stack Developer
about.intro: I help businesses save time, reduce costs, and scale by building smart AI automations and high-quality web applications.
about.description: With deep expertise in both AI technologies and full-stack development, I bridge the gap between cutting-edge automation and practical business solutions. My approach is simple: understand your challenges, design efficient solutions, and deliver results that actually impact your bottom line.
about.readyDescription: Whether you need AI automation, a custom web application, or both—let's discuss how I can help your business grow.

results.title: Results-Driven
results.description: Every line of code I write is focused on delivering measurable business outcomes. I don't just build features—I solve problems.

efficient.title: Fast & Efficient
efficient.description: Quick turnaround without compromising quality. I respect deadlines and keep you updated throughout the project.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.description: I write maintainable, scalable code that your team can easily understand and extend. No shortcuts, no technical debt.

aiFirst.title: AI-First Thinking
aiFirst.description: I always look for opportunities to leverage AI for automation and efficiency gains that give you a competitive edge.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of AI automation, web development, and integration projects that delivered real business results.
projects.haveSimilar: Have a Similar Project in Mind?
projects.similarDescription: Let's discuss how I can help you achieve similar results for your business.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Automation Suite
ecommerce.description: Built a comprehensive automation system for an online retail store. The solution automatically processes orders, syncs inventory across multiple platforms, handles customer inquiries with an AI chatbot, and generates daily reports.
ecommerce.challenge: The client was spending 40+ hours per week on manual order processing and customer support.
ecommerce.solution: Implemented AI agents for customer support, automated order processing pipelines, and real-time inventory sync.

analytics.title: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Designed and developed a full-stack analytics platform for a B2B SaaS company. Features real-time data visualization, user management, subscription billing, and white-label capabilities.
analytics.challenge: The company needed a scalable dashboard solution that could handle 10,000+ users with real-time updates.
analytics.solution: Built with Next.js and PostgreSQL, implemented real-time WebSocket updates and optimized database queries.

customerService.title: AI Customer Service Platform
customerService.description: Created an intelligent customer service bot that handles inquiries 24/7, integrates with the company CRM, creates support tickets, and escalates complex issues to human agents.
customerService.challenge: Support team was overwhelmed with 500+ daily inquiries, causing long response times and customer frustration.
customerService.solution: Deployed GPT-4 powered chatbot with custom training data, CRM integration, and smart escalation logic.

landingPage.title: Startup Landing Page
landingPage.description: Designed and built a high-converting landing page for a tech startup. Focused on clear messaging, fast performance, and SEO optimization to drive organic traffic and conversions.
landingPage.challenge: The startup needed to launch quickly with a professional web presence that could convert visitors into leads.
landingPage.solution: Created a mobile-first, SEO-optimized landing page with clear CTAs and lead capture forms.

internalTools.title: Internal Tools Dashboard
internalTools.description: Built a comprehensive internal tools platform for a growing company. Includes employee management, project tracking, time logging, and automated reporting.
internalTools.challenge: Team was using 5+ different tools for daily operations, causing inefficiency and data silos.
internalTools.solution: Consolidated all tools into a single, custom-built platform with integrations to existing systems.

docProcessing.title: Document Processing Automation
docProcessing.description: Automated document processing workflow for a legal firm. The system extracts key information from contracts, categorizes documents, and populates the case management system.
docProcessing.challenge: Paralegals spent 20+ hours weekly manually reviewing and categorizing incoming documents.
docProcessing.solution: Implemented OCR and GPT-based extraction with custom validation rules and CMS integration.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include custom solutions tailored to your business.
pricing.customQuote: for a custom quote tailored to your specific needs.
